abstract: Cookbooks Land of Fish and Rice: Recipes From the Culinary Heart of China by Fuchsia Dunlop and All Under Heaven: Recipes From the 35 Cuisines of China by Carolyn Phillips contain illustrations and other details to make Chinese cooking easier; recipe for Shanghai stir-fried chunky noodles offered.

headline.main: Review: Two Books to Master Chinese Cuisines

keywords.value: Land of Fish and Rice: Recipes From the Culinary Heart of China (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

keywords.value: All Under Heaven: Recipes From the 35 Cuisines of China (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: Fuchsia Dunlop explores the cuisine of Jiangnan in “Land of Fish and Rice,” and Carolyn Phillips takes a broad approach to Chinese cooking in “All Under Heaven.”...
lead_paragraph: Fuchsia Dunlop explores the cuisine of Jiangnan in “Land of Fish and Rice,” and Carolyn Phillips takes a broad approach to Chinese cooking in “All Under Heaven.”
